column4: Geekphreak, have you heard about RCN and the Class Action Law Suit against them because RCN blocked P2P traffic?
A Judge ordered RCN to pay back money to their customers.
It is not Off Topic. Most of the problems that occur with port problems are due to IP blocking ports. Such as emails etc.
it is offtopic because it is not ubuntu support related. please join #ubuntu-offtopic to discuss other topics
